P:System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtocol; Modifying this would affect Visual Studio's process wide networking state.
M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsOutputWindowPane.OutputString(System.String); Prefer OutputWindowTextWriter for a free-threaded alternative. If that is not feasible, prefer IVsOutputWindowPaneNoPump.OutputStringNoPump (free-threaded) or OutputStringThreadSafe (not free-threaded).
T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading.AsyncSemaphore; Waiting for this semaphore on the UI thread can hang Visual Studio. Prefer the JTF-aware ReentrantSemaphore, making sure to specify the process-wide JoinableTaskContext. To maintain the same behavior as AsyncSemaphore, use ReentrancyMode.NotRecognized, otherwise, to allow reentrancy use either ReentrancyMode.Stack or ReentrancyMode.Freeform.
T:System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim; Waiting for this semaphore on the UI thread can hang Visual Studio. Prefer the JTF-aware ReentrantSemaphore, making sure to specify the process-wide JoinableTaskContext. To maintain the same behavior as SemaphoreSlim, use ReentrancyMode.NotRecognized, otherwise, to allow reentrancy use either ReentrancyMode.Stack or ReentrancyMode.Freeform.
